column1: seeks to compel public authorities to enforce existing statutory duties rather
than to resolve a private property dispute. The 1st to 4th Respondents have a
statutory  duty  under  the  Urban  Development  Authority  Act  and  related
regulations to address unauthorized constructions  and enforce compliance,
making  this  issue  one  of  administrative  enforcement  rather  than  private
litigation.

column2: andamus is warranted when a public authority has a clear legal duty that

duty. The Petitioner has demonstrated both: (i) he holds a right to his property
and  the  use  of  the  access  road;

constructions within their jurisdiction and to enforce building compliance.

Respondents have failed in their statutory duties.
